title: 간접의문문 (I wonder/I don't know)
intent: 의문사가 포함된 간접의문문의 어순과 시제를 정확히 구사한다.
lexset: wonder, know, remember, forget, understand, explain, tell, ask, question, curious

seeds.en: I wonder when he will come.
I don't know where they are.

seeds.kr: 이 문제를 어떻게 해결할지 생각 중이에요.
seeds.en: I'm thinking about how to solve this problem.

seeds.kr: 그가 올지 안 올지 확실하지 않아요.
seeds.en: I'm not sure if he will come or not.

seeds.kr: 왜 그런 일이 일어났는지 이해할 수 없어요.
seeds.en: I can't understand why that happened.
I want to know who did this.
Please tell me when it will finish.
I don't remember how much it costs.

seeds.kr: 어느 것이 더 좋은지 결정할 수 없어요.
seeds.en: I can't decide which one is better.
I wonder if they can succeed.
